title: The Other Side Continent
description: The Other Side ContinentThe Other Side of the Continent a 20 years research that details sea voyages on the worldâ€™s great oceans, including all those components that give light to an ancient effort to explore the Atlantic Ocean and probably even the American continent. The book includes 133 photographs, drawings, and watercolor paintings that illustrate historical and technical details about the seamanship of the ancient and medieval world.
author: Michail Varvarousis
